sentence.Network_en: He had to be bundled unceremoniously out of the way.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被人粗鲁地推搡到了一边。

sentence.Network_en: They dumped his belongings unceremoniously on the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们粗暴地把他的物品摔到地板上。

sentence.Network_en: She was unceremoniously dumped to be replaced by a leader who could win the election.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被人踢掉了，取而代之的是一个能够赢得选举的领导人物。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unceremonious 随便的 unceremoniously 随便地 unceremoniousness 无礼.

list.abs: The dinner was a relaxed , unceremonious occasion ., 那次宴会很轻松 , 随随便便.
to be unceremoniously dismissed or terminated., 被非正式地解雇或中止工作.
to be unceremoniously dismissed or terminated., 被非正式地解雇或中止工作.
his unceremonious departure , dismissal , removal , etc., 他唐突离去 , 遭解雇 , 遭免职等.

entry.def: If someone or something is removed, left, or put somewhere unceremoniously, this is done in a sudden or rude way that shows they are not thought to be important.

example.ex: She was unceremoniously dumped to be replaced by a leader who could win the election...
example.tran: 她被人踢掉了，取而代之的是一个能够赢得选举的领导人物。

example.ex: He had to be bundled unceremoniously out of the way.
example.tran: 他被人粗鲁地推搡到了一边。

auth_sentence.content: Five hours later, the cast and crew dispersed unceremoniously.
auth_sentence.res_content: Five hours later, the cast and crew dispersed unceremoniously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Five hours later, the cast and crew dispersed unceremoniously.

auth_sentence.content: The young man unceremoniously sent it back with a curt note.
auth_sentence.res_content: The young man unceremoniously sent it back with a curt note.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The young man unceremoniously sent it back with a curt note.

auth_sentence.content: Two bodies draped in a blanket lay unceremoniously on the pavement outside the hospital, waiting to be collected.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two bodies draped in a blanket lay unceremoniously on the pavement outside the hospital, waiting to be collected.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two bodies draped in a blanket lay unceremoniously on the pavement outside the hospital, waiting to be collected.

sentences.en: They carried him down to the beach and dumped him unceremoniously in the freezing water.
sentences.cn: 他们把他抬到海滩，随便地把他扔进了冰冷的海水里。
